sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>REST API Resource path in the remote environment. By default: released</description><ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>release_date.resource_path</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alealvar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 20:52:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>875814a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>release_date.resource_path</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Release Date" source="541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Release Date">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_875814a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb64</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alealvar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 20:52:54</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>release_date.resource_path</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=875814a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb64"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_b606dc601b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>release_date.send_to_lower_env</event_name><name>Post release date to lower environment</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function(){
    
	try {
        var data = JSON.parse(event.parm1);
        var resourcePath = gs.getProperty('release_date.resource_path');

        var endpoint = data.url + resourcePath + '?sys_id=' + data.sys_id + '&release_date=' + data.timestamp;

        // PUT request
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setEndpoint(endpoint);
        request.setHttpMethod('PUT');

        request.setBasicAuth(data.user, data.pass);
        request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");

        request.execute();
		
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error(JSON.stringify(e, null, 2));
    }
	
})();]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alealvar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 20:43:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b606dc601b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Post release date to lower environment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Release Date" source="541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Release Date">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_b606dc601b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alealvar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 20:44:06</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_query_parameter_map_7bf754e41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb0b
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_query_parameter_map"><sys_ws_query_parameter_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>sys_ws_query_parameter_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alealvar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 20:50:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>7bf754e41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cb0790641b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb4d</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Release Date" source="541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Release Date">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_query_parameter_map_7bf754e41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alealvar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 20:50:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_operation display_value="Release date">11a7d4a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba6</web_service_operation><web_service_query_parameter display_value="release_date">cb0790641b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcb4d</web_service_query_parameter></sys_ws_query_parameter_map></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_11a7d4a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>PUT</http_method><name>Release date</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var id = request.queryParams.sys_id.toString();
    var release_date = request.queryParams.release_date.toString();

    if (gs.nil(id)) {
        return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('ID is a mandatory query parameter');
    }

    if (gs.nil(release_date)) {
        return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('Release date is a mandatory query parameter');
    }

    var grSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
    if (!grSet.get(id)) {
        return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError('Update set not found. ID: ' + id);
    }

    var gdtRelease = new GlideDateTime;
    gdtRelease.setNumericValue(release_date);

    grSet.autoSysFields(false);
    grSet.setWorkflow(false);

    grSet.setValue('release_date', gdtRelease);
    grSet.update();
    return true;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/660033/update_set/released</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/released</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alealvar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 20:50:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>11a7d4a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Release date</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Release Date" source="541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Release Date">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_11a7d4a41b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcba6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alealvar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 20:50:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Update Set">5ae65c241b8ac59015ab1f4a234bcbaf</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2da350ac1b4ac59015ab1f4a234bcb54
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_remote_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_remote_update_set">stateCHANGESTOcommitted^update_sourceISNOTEMPTY^sys_class_name=sys_remote_update_set^EQ<item display_value="Committed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="committed"/><item endquery="false" field="update_source" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="Retrieved Update Set" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="sys_remote_update_set"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Post release date to lower environment</name><order>10000</order><priority>10000</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var grUpdateSource = current.update_source.getRefRecord();

    var data = {};
    data.url = grUpdateSource.getValue('url');
    data.user = grUpdateSource.getValue('username');

    var encryptedPass = grUpdateSource.getValue('password');
    var Encrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
    data.pass = Encrypter.decrypt(encryptedPass);

    data.sys_id = current.getValue('remote_sys_id');

    var strCommitDate = grInputUpdateSet.getValue('commit_date');
    var gdtCommitDate = new GlideDateTime(strCommitDate);
    data.timestamp = gdtCommitDate.getNumericValue();

    gs.eventQueue('release_date.send_to_lower_env', current, JSON.stringify(data));

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alealvar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 20:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2da350ac1b4ac59015ab1f4a234bcb54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Post release date to lower environment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Release Date" source="541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Release Date">541350241bc6c59015ab1f4a234bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2da350ac1b4ac59015ab1f4a234bcb54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alealvar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 20:36:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2da350ac1b4ac59015ab1f4a234bcb54"/></record_update>
